Properties summary

AvailabilitySet
AvailabilitySet

Gets or sets the reference Id of the availability set to which the virtual machine belongs.
DiagnosticsProfile
DiagnosticsProfile

Gets or sets the diagnostics profile.
HardwareProfile
HardwareProfile

Gets or sets the hardware profile.
InstanceView
InstanceView

Gets the virtual machine instance view.
LicenseType
LicenseType

Gets or sets specifies that the image or disk that is being used was licensed on-premises. This element is only used for images that contain the Windows Server operating system.
NetworkProfile
NetworkProfile

Gets or sets the network profile.
OsProfile
OsProfile

Gets or sets the OS profile.
Plan
Plan

Gets or sets the purchase plan when deploying virtual machine from VM Marketplace images.
ProvisioningState
ProvisioningState

Gets the provisioning state, which only appears in the response.
Resources
Resources

Gets the virtual machine child extension resources.
StorageProfile
StorageProfile

Gets or sets the storage profile.
VmId
VmId

Gets specifies the VM unique ID which is a 128-bits identifier that is encoded and stored in all Azure IaaS VMs SMBIOS and can be read using platform BIOS commands.

      String
      String
